sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useContext} from 'react'; import {AppContext} from '../../contexts/AppContext' import styled from "styled-components"; import moment from 'moment'; const StudentProfile = () => { const { user, } = useContext(AppContext) console.log(user) return (

About Me

Full Name: {user.firstName} {user.lastName}
Student Id: {user.studentId}
Department: {user.program}
Email: {user.email}
Gender: {user.gender}
Date of Birth: {moment(user.dob).format('MMM Do')}
); }; const ProfileWrapper = styled.div` ` export default StudentProfile;
